segments.text: The woman's so caught up in her routine, it's almost pitiful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water overflowing, ruining the kitchen, and she doesn't know.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle at her feet, potential for a sad slip.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Kids sneaking cookies, but that stool looks dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy reaching high, one wrong move and he'll tumble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl waiting eagerly, innocent in all this risk.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside is beautiful, but inside feels lonely with the ignorance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes waiting to be done, but hazards ignored.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a pang seeing the potential for tears ahead.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cookie jar tempting them into troubleâ€”such a shame.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This unnoticed mischief might end in disappointment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Wish she would turn around and make it all right.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene tugs at my heartstrings.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a reminder of how quickly joy can turn to sorrow.
segments.speaker: PAR
